text: Awu ukuwesha wuliwuli kumuwombela mlongu waku, mlongu leki nguwushi chibandi mulisu lyaku na kunu ukuliwona ng'odu lijika liveli mulisu lyaku umweni? Yuwi mfyangu! Wushi tanila lijika liveli mulisu lyaku, pambeli dauweshi kulola unofu na dauweshi kumuwusha chibandi chiveli mulisu lya mlongu waku.
